title: Enhancing Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Learning Strategy Development through Case-Based Mathematical Instructional Design Workshops

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners will analyze problem cases occurring in actual elementary mathematics education settings and derive at least three core issues.
Learners will evaluate teaching strategies presented in peer case-based discussions and propose at least one optimal solution.
Learners will respond to instructors' facilitative prompts on the LMS discussion board and explore at least 80% of the problem space.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
